title: LeBron James, Packers, Fury-Wilder, & where Colin was right and wrong
itunes:title: LeBron James, Packers, Fury-Wilder, & where Colin was right and wrong
description:
Colin explains why LeBron James is the leader of the Lakers and not Anthony Davis, why the Packers should consider drafting a certain QB if he's available, his thoughts on Tyson Fury's victory over Deontay Wilder, and where he was right and wrong over the weekend. Guests include Chris Broussard, B. J. Armstrong, Wade Phillips, and TJ Houshmandzadeh.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
